s1.message: Fixed: context menu items do not appear when "Check banner links" option is switched on (forum thread)

s2.message: Fixed: object tabs break page layout on some pages (bug 12911)

s3.message: Fixed: object tab size does not adapt to text size (e.g. when increasing text size)

s4.message: Made sure that dynamic properties of object tabs cannot be overridden by web page's styles

s5.message: Now preventing web pages from probing for Adblock Plus by abusing bug 292789 in Gecko (bug 16027). Other extensions can use this protection as well via extensions.adblockplus.protectchrome.* preferences.

s6.message: Added public IAdblockPlus.allowOnce() method to be used by other extensions

s7.message: Remote images in data: and javascript: frames are blocked now

s8.message: Fixed: Frames created by object tags don't appear in blockable items list (bug 16021)

s9.message: Made handling of frames and images embedded as objects consistent (bug 16144)

s10.message: Releasing memory sooner on dynamic pages where nodes are removed from the document (bug 16125)

s11.message: SeaMonkey 1.1: middle-clicking an item in the sidebar wouldn't open it in a new tab

s12.message: SeaMonkey 1.1: default action (going to the address from the clipboard) shouldn't be invoked when middle-clicking in the sidebar

s13.message: K-Meleon: Fixed bug that was severely breaking functionality

s14.message: K-Meleon: Fixed background image attachment in toolbar
